website_summaries.verdict: A superb lumbar support pillow that helps address minor and chronic back pain.
pros: Has been shown to help alleviate back aches, arthritis and other minor and long-lasting back issues
Includes a hypoallergenic mesh cover that delivers amazing versatility
Includes adjustable straps so you can instantly take the pillow on or off a chair
Backed by a lifetime replacement guarantee
cons: Pillow straps may slide if the cushion is used inside a vehicle
May be too big for some users

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to, but seems good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a short time and I've only used it a couple times on short car trips. That being said, I think it will help a lot on long trips. It takes some getting used to and a little adjusting to find what works for you but I think it was a good investment. As you can see from the pictures, it sits kind of funny in my smaller cars seats, but once you sit in the chair it fills the gap. I'm taking a longer trip this weekend, so I will try to get back on here with an update.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Had really bad back pain because my chair has no back support and I spend hours on my chair. Decided to give the cushion a shot and just after a couple of days my pain was gone! Transformed my chair into a super comfortable chair. Avoided buying a new one. Check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe

customer_reviews.title: I'd say this was definitely the best choice one can make
customer_reviews.text: As a software developer, this is exactly what I was looking. Between choosing a brand new "gaming" type chair that can help me sit for hours (Meaning i'd have to replace my computer chair that was not cheap), or choosing this "EverLasting Comfort". I'd say this was definitely the best choice one can make. Comes with double straps for tight grip. Well worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward palermo

customer_reviews.title: Helped with migraine relief caused by improper back positioning
customer_reviews.text: My husband had frequent migraines that were partially brought on by siting in an office chair for long periods of time. I bought him this pillow for Christmas, and while i will not say it is a cure, it has helped tremendously. The pillow forces him to sit up more and correcting his posture has alleviated the pain in his back and reduced his migraines significantly. The rest we attribute to dealing with a high stress job, and while the pillow is great for back relief, a miracle worker it is not. Thanks for an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mccauley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This back cushion is amazing. I am using it as I write this review - I love it! It provides excellent lumbar support. My first lumbar pillow was smaller and had only one strap. This larger cushion is so much more comfortable; it hits my back in all the right places. (And since it is memory foam, I'm sure it will hit your back in all the right places too!) Having two straps ensures the cushion doesn't slide when attached to a chair. The cushion provides great back support on upholstered furniture too. Now I can sit on my couch again! I just bought a second cushion for myself, and another for my sister. :) Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: FabMom26

customer_reviews.title: Support and comfort at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hip which also causes back pain. Sitting could often be quite painful, but this back pad makes it tolerable. The two straps adjust to different chairs and keep the pad firmly in place. I did not have problems with an unpleasant smell as some reviewers have stated. I am quite pleased with my purchase an would recommend it to others who need that extra back support.
customer_reviews.author: nien

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect. I have lower back pain after an injury (fantastic spill down the stairs, you wouldn't believe the crash I made. I work at a desk job and this cushion combined with foot support is what gets me through the day. It is nice and firm but not rock hard. It feels like it's part of the seat and is easy to adjust. It came with extra straps in case my desk chair had a wider back. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bonse

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many of these types of products and really shopped around before buying this one. The cushion material they use and symmetry (there is no up or down orientation) on this product is actually really innovative and I had heard good things. The material is really nice for long drives as it sort of contours to your spine.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Issues with my lower back
customer_reviews.text: I bought two after determining I have some serious lack of lumbar support in my Jeep Wrangler. I have a 60-70 mile commute to and from work every day and the suspension is very loose, so I feel everything. I think between exercising and the constant sitting on the commute (and at work), I may have aggravated my SI Joint. First day to work and at my desk, the support on my back is amazing. I don't feel like I am slouching down in my seat which was obviously causing me discomfort long term. This padding is a blessing. The material is plush and soft and the memory foam is not too tough. I recommend you try it!
customer_reviews.author: HCR

customer_reviews.title: Better than all the rest
customer_reviews.text: I have so many lumbar pillows of all types of materials and shapes. None is comfortable until this one that my med student nephew recommended. This one is perfect. Not too big, not too pushed out on the lumbar, and just the right amount of give. Now, instead of buying a new couch I am using this cushion and the couch is now comfortable. Use it in the car and on my kitchen chairs. I cannot say enough good things about this cushion. You will be so happy with it if you buy it!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I was delightfully surprised to find that this cushion works great! I sleep in this recliner
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical that this cushion would work for me. I don't use it in a traditional office chair sitting in front of my computer; I use it in a big recliner that has no lower lumbar/back support. I was delightfully surprised to find that this cushion works great! I sleep in this recliner. It's roomy, but needed something extra to have me waking up pain free, and the Everlasting Comfort 100% pure Memory Foam Back Cushion works so very well. Kudos to the creator for this excellent cushion - and when the time comes to buy a new one - I'll be looking to buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dovelady

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the car and it’s been a great help when my back acts up and in general with my posture while sitting. I’m going to buy again for my dad who also had back issues. Great product. Has belts to secure to your chair. Doesn’t fit around the car seat but contrary to what another reviewer wrote, it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: SansaCarr

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This backrest is absolutely amazing for my back pain. I've been suffering with chronic back pain pretty much my entire adult life. I've been morbidly obese my entire life, and even though I am losing weight, I still have back pain in the way. This backrest helps me have a much better posture so I'm not slouching so much when I'm sitting down, which I do a lot of when I'm relaxing. I love this backrest, I'm thinking about buying one for my car!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda St. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great Item great lumbar support Highly recommend this item It's exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Abe Bouzaglou

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive & Sleek Looking
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other items like this for my office chair as I found my back hurting due to poor posture. This is the first time I have found something that easily fits on my chair and can be altered to fit by size chair and height in the right way! It is extremely comfortable and after only a few days my back stopped hurting. I have had many co workers ask me where I purchased this as they see how sleek and comfortable it is by testing it themselves at my desk! I highly recommend this for anyone looking for a foam back pad for their chair/seat! The everlasting comfort item is worth the purchase! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Perkins

customer_reviews.title: It's soft and nicely conforms to the natural curves in ones spine
customer_reviews.text: Im a therapist and have tried several lumbar supports over the last few years. This one exceeds on multiple levels. First, the memory foam is high quality. It's soft and nicely conforms to the natural curves in ones spine. It comfortably supports the back without being too thick. The double straps help hold it securely in place. And I love the fact that the cover can be removed and easily cleaned. I'm currently using it in my car as I often make long commutes and this has made all the difference from feeling achy after a drive to feeling good! If you're looking for a reasonably priced, effective and comfortable lumbar support. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: 2Travel

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam?  Try memory concrete!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to using my goosedown pillow, this item has no ability to fit me. Instead of fitting me it is like the item wants me to fit it! YMMV though. Product does seem to be of a decent quality construction so if it winds up working for you, then life is good.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Can barely tighten straps in the back
customer_reviews.text: Description fails to note that straps cannot be tightened properly if you have an office chair that has a back that's not at least 1.3 ft wide, which is commonly the case with a lot of office chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Defective piece
customer_reviews.text: I’ve unboxed only after 2 months of purchase and this was because, my family was on Vacation and with in couple of weeks of usage, I noticed a slight break in the center of the support which gives a crack feeling and later I also noticed a minor tear which made me felt this product was a defective piece. Unfortunately, the return time window was lapsed and I couldn’t return claiming for the damage which is my bad. Ps. The choice made to buy this one is because my friend was using it for a long time and he doesn’t have any problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Suman

customer_reviews.title: Way too large for the average office chair
customer_reviews.text: This pad is huge for the average office chair. I was pretty much sitting on the edge of my seat with it behind me and it made my back hurt even more because of the weird angle it made me sit at. I'm an average height and weight so it makes no sense why it would fit this way. Product seemed of good quality and it's nice how it came with removable extenders. I returned since it's not what I expected and didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: It is like a torture
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. The memory foam has no memory. My back was getting even more pain. I returned and bought an even cheaper Samsonite one, which was way better.
customer_reviews.author: xavier

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I've only had my cushion for a few days but I'm so glad I have it. I have severe spinal stenosis and I needed help keeping my posture straight as I tended to slouch forward. I have a deep seating couch and I needed to attach my lumbar cushion to a large throw pillow I have. By doing that I can now keep both feet flat on the floor like I am suppose to. Did not have to use the extenders. I like the two straps to keep it from slipping. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pam M.

customer_reviews.title: Pushes you out and sends you to the mars.
customer_reviews.text: It pushes the person way to forward to lean back or even to put neck on the headrest. Might be good for office use or something where you dont need to lean your head back but definitely not a good choice for car, absolutely not.
customer_reviews.author: Shahriar Omar

customer_reviews.title: Great for your back!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product as a lumbar support on my recumbent trike. The seat on the trike is comfortable, but I need more support for my lower back. This back cushion did this and more. It not only gives me lower back support, it enhances the comfort of my entire back. As it works so well in this application, I can see it working on lawn furniture, and, well, just about anywhere you sit. Well worth the money. NOTE: The pad is placed upside down on my trike to push my seating position forward, and to provide a more gradual transition from the pad to the seat back. In more traditional applications, it will be reversed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stone

customer_reviews.title: Back Pain Sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the seat & back pad as I was suffering from a compressed disk and Lumbar Strain. Both great products. They give ample support while being light weight. I thought they may become warm during use as some memory foam does but surprisingly, they stay cool. With a quick unzip, the covers can be removed to be washed which is a major plus. The pads work well on couches with deep backs as well allowing you the ability to center your feet beneath you before standing. I would recommend both the seat & back pad for those suffering from chronic back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bernhard

customer_reviews.title: While this cushion feels sturdy and substantial
customer_reviews.text: While this cushion feels sturdy and substantial, not cheep at all, it is way too big for anyone's natural lumbar curvature. I bought this because our Honda CRV seat is like a torture device, but this unfortunately not a remedy. If it were about half as deep and a few inches narrower it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: SJL

customer_reviews.title: My Lifesaver!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a lifesaver!!!! I have a bad back & my vehicle does not have the extra lumbar support. I couldn't hardly believe the difference it made!! Fits like a charm with two adjustable stretchy straps. I am so glad I found this product!! I highly recommend it to anyone that needs extra lower lumbar support. It has sure made a difference in how my back feels on short trips & longer ones. At this point, I have no cons for this product. It's a big PRO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Great value cushion for your money!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cushion for just one week but I already like it so much better than the old cushion that I had been using for years. I spend approximately 10 hrs/day sitting at my desk and the high density foam gives great support to my back. The two straps allow you to move it to where you want it and it stays in place. This cushion is a good value for your money and I would recommend it if you have back pain and spend long hours sitting in one place.
customer_reviews.author: PQ

customer_reviews.title: Great support, easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to travel by car from Florida to New England. She found it to be very supportive and comfortable. The two straps to secure it to the car seat work very well, holding it securely in place, even as you get in and out of the car. The memory foam maintains support over time so the effectiveness lasts for the duration of a day long trip. She, and I, are very pleased with this cushion.
customer_reviews.author: cowmanfl

customer_reviews.title: So far I am not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: So far I am not happy with the product. It has a terrible chemical smell. I emailed the vendor regarding this and ever heard back. I'm hoping they exchange if.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Kinda Disappointed in this product! This first day it worked great! Had it for a week and it's more of a pain than a help! Back hurts worse now than before
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D.

customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews... I’m usually happy with everything I order from amazon. I drive with Lyft full time and wanted a soft pillow that would eliminate some of the pain from my lower back and prevent me from slouching to maintain my pasture. It is a soft pillow. However after a week from driving the straps continue to slide having me adjust numerous times throughout the day. Today one strap completely ripped off when I was trying to adjust again... To the trash it goes...
customer_reviews.author: Onmywhey

customer_reviews.title: Your BACK will THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent QUALITY on this cushion...very easy setup to find that right comfort spot. Immediate relief from LOWER BACK pains.
customer_reviews.author: MS R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product with excellent back support at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: tsheaffer23

customer_reviews.title: If you're short
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have put a little more thought into it before buying, but I read 'memory foam' and thought I'd be set. The truth is that this cushion is VERY FIRM, I put it in my car and knew i was barely making a dent in it. Additionally, I'm 5'2" and when I try to place this maybe 2-3 inches off the seat so that it actually lets my spine curve, it goes up to my shoulder blades, it's no different than turning my car seat into a low-backed chair. Will probably work well for taller people, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: Too tall to support only lumbar
customer_reviews.text: The height of the cushion is a little high. A true lumbar cushion should only help your lumbar Vertebrae be pushed forward. This cushion also pushes the middle of your back forward. Therefore, instead of a natural "s curve" in your back this cushion gives you slanted back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the support pillow on my office chair. Without realizing it, I've been slouching and ending up with an extremely achy back. I ordered this and true to the reviews, it's made all the difference in the world. As some of the reviewers pointed out, the straps only tighten so much so it does slip when I stand up and move around. I was able to resolve the problem by crisscrossing the straps behind my chair, keeping it in position. My back feels so much better and I'm able to stay at my computer longer.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E. Boza

customer_reviews.title: Really satisfied product
customer_reviews.text: I have a back pain because of the spine disk problem for several years. I can't sit on the chair over 1hour because after 1 hour I started to feel pain in my spine. But after using this, I found myself spending several hours on the chair without the pain. I finally find the best product that supports my back really well. : )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Support But Beware of Task Chairs With Gaps
customer_reviews.text: While this support works well and seems to be constructed well buyers should be aware that if using on task chairs where there is a gap between the back and seat this unit doesn't hold its position well because the bottom of the two straps just clears the back of the seat and tends to slip down with use. The top strap is not sufficient to hold it in place. It would seem best suited to chairs that do not have a significant gap between the back and seat.
customer_reviews.author: T. Good

customer_reviews.title: Not for Wide Backs
customer_reviews.text: The sides of this lumbar support curve forward. I'm just a bit above average size-wise and this cushion is too narrow for my frame and the protruding sides of the cushion are putting pressure on the sides of my back in the kidney area. The cushion is made of memory foam but it's fairly stiff. Although it doesn't feel like a solid object poking me, it's still enough pressure to be uncomfortable. If you have a small frame this is probably a good option, anyone on the wider side should look for something else. I will be returning this and trying a lumbar support with a different form factor now that I know what to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Wing

customer_reviews.title: Concave shape creats pressure from sides, not for me as a man.
customer_reviews.text: Women might like this shape, but not for me. I have an average man's body and concave shape makes worse with pressures from sides. The concave radius would make difference however. This one size fit shape is uncomfortable. Tempur-pedic version has a flat contact area and is better without side pressures.
customer_reviews.author: Onsenboy

customer_reviews.title: Good lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it has straps that go around the seat. It's a good lumbar support. the only thing I have a problem with... interesting I never thought of it.. but in the winter time the cushion is initially hard as a rock, and needs to be warmed in order to be soft and work well. It takes only 10 minutes for it to become fine... just something interesting to make a note of for cold climates.
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Julie in Waukesha

customer_reviews.title: Back pain cured!
customer_reviews.text: This back pillow works on recliners too, which is good, as recliners have a tendency to cause low back pain, at least in my case. I was leary about this purchase as I previously bought a back pillow that did not really help. I can say within hours of using this pillow my previous back pain associated with my recliner disappeared, and it's very comfortable. I liked that I could buy a red pillow to match my decor. I also was leary that a strapped in pillow would work for my back, since I like the support very low, but it works perfectly and doesn't move out of place.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ocean

customer_reviews.title: It's a large cushion
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This cushion is a bit thicker than other lumbar support cushions that I have used; it is also wider and slightly taller. The straps have extenders so that this can easily fit around a car seat. There are two straps on the back so that it is more stable than if there were just a single strap. Cons: Because it is a bit thicker, it is hard to use on my dining room chairs. It puts me too far forward in the chair. Overall, this is a great cushion that was soft but still provided support. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B

customer_reviews.title: For people who work office jobs
customer_reviews.text: A little backstory, I work on my chair in my home office for about 12 hours a day. I'm sitting for most of the time besides getting up for lunch and dinner and quick stretches. This cushion provides awesome lumbar and back support to help me going throughout the day. Before I found this product, I was just using my office chair, but noticed that I was slouching and had bad posture. Adding this cushion helped me maintain better sitting posture throughout the day while keeping me comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Torng

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT,  once you get used to it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my dad, who should be retired, but still works on his feet, on a concrete floor, for 8-10hrs a day. His back has been so bad the last few years, but he says that he's had some relief since putting this support on his truck seat. Says that it takes some getting used to, and some seat adjustments at first, but there's noted improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally bought this
customer_reviews.text: Been working from home for a few months using a desk and chair that is designed for aesthetics versus a true home office. The desk chair is comfortable but not for 10 hour days so I decided to try this and I really like it. The straps have a removal section for smaller chairs, like mine. However, the straps were still too long so I tied some knots in them and it is secured to my chair. I am finally sitting upright and not slouching. So glad I bought it since I'll be home for months.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The cushion is too thick and support straps too long
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard rolling business task chair. The cushion was too thick and I ended up sitting too far forward in my chair. I felt like I was being pitched toward. The straps were also too long even when they were fully retracted to the shortest length making the cushion floppy and unable to stay in position. I was more comfortable without it and wish I hadn’t spent money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Second one I've ordered. Love it and won't live without it again!
customer_reviews.text: I use one in the car for my lower lumbar and one in my office chair. Anywhere I sit I make sure it's with me. It significantly relieves lumbar pain. I'm tall and lanky with bad posture. It is what it is. This pillow is something I wish I bought 10 years ago. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Eagles Nest

customer_reviews.title: You'll need a deep computer chair seat to use this effectively
customer_reviews.text: Although it's wonderfully well made, it didn't work for me at all because it is so thick. When placed over the back of a computer desk chair, it took up almost 40% of the depth of the seat from front to back. As a result, with the cushion in place, I was forced to sit so far forward on the seat that I felt like I was ready to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: JRobertT

customer_reviews.title: To thick for my office chair
customer_reviews.text: This did help my lower back pain but made my upper back pain worse. Before you buy this, you have to think about the shape of the chair that you are going to use this with. When I put this support pillow on my chair, it gave me great support for my lower back BUT my upper back never touched the back of my chair which made my upper back muscles support my frame, which over time caused me upper back pain. I ended up buying a new chair for home, with great lumbar support AND great upper back support, and stopped using this support pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft. Absolutely no support.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this lumbar pillow. It's way too soft. There is absolutely no support--it just flattens completely out when you sit back. It's too squishy to even bother with and it's not any better than a regular pillow. I can't believe people are not mentioning this in the reviews. It's so soft right now I can't imagine how quickly it will wear out with use. If you need any strength or firmness don't buy this overly soft pillow. I got this brand on the recommendation of Bob & Brad, the youtube physical therapists, thinking it would be something of quality. Nope. They need to rethink their endorsement of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kiim

customer_reviews.title: Saved my lower back during the long drives
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my long drive from Boston to DC during thanksgiving weekend, in what I call the worst traffic of the year. Took me around 13.5 hours each way, and although I can handle a long drive for the most part, my back always hates me at the end. This made the trip and its aftermath so much more bearable! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fatima N.

customer_reviews.title: Big Help for Husband with Spinal Issues
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item & several other mobility/back support type items to alleviate my husband's sudden onset severe back pain. This item paired with the circular swivel seat was a big help for him prior to his first spinal epidural. He may require surgery in the future and we think this is a great tool to have in our home "Aging Gracefully" arsenal. When he's using his massage cushion in the TV den, I like to borrow it to use when I'm sewing to maintain good posture. Thinking of getting a second one, it's well made and comfy, does the job it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great chair support, long straps
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to improve the ergonomics of my home office and needed a support for my back. This is a nice support and definitely does the job. It also looks nice, which is important to me since I work at home. My only disappointment in the item is that the straps are too long to fit around my chair properly so I have to adjust it every time I sit down. That is not a huge deal, but it would be better is the straps held it in place.
customer_reviews.author: robinja

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a chair that doesn't have the lumbar support needed, which has been causing lower back pain and causing me to slump in my chair. This product has just the right balance of softness vs. support. It conforms to my chair, as well as my back, yet provides the needed support to keep me in an optimal ergonomic position while working for hours each day. My back pain is gone!! I chose this one not only because of the high ratings, but it has two straps to hold it in place, which I'm thinking is crucial. Also, the straps have removable lengtheners which I really appreciated. This product should work for any chair configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: This is a life-saver on long car rides!
customer_reviews.text: I am short - 5'3" with good shoes on and cars are not designed to fit me well. My legs go numb from pressing them into the seat front in order to reach the pedals and the lumbar support hits my shoulder blades. This back cushion supports my back properly and pushes me forward just enough that my knees are past the front of the seat. I drive 10+ hours to see my parents and usually have to stop and rest every hour because of pain. I've made the trip twice since getting this and only had to stop for fuel! It is a life-saver! I combine it with this seat cushion for perfect comfort on a car ride:
customer_reviews.author: K. Tate

customer_reviews.title: High quality lumbar pillow...
customer_reviews.text: I was frankly surprised by the quality construction of this pillow. It far surpasses others I have owned. When I first opened the bag covering the pillow, I held it up to my nose and smelled a very faint odor. However, this odor was not at all apparent when the pillow was more than a few inches from my nose. The pillow was easy to install on my computer chair and the two straps hold it in place with no slipping. I am very happy with my pillow and recommend it to others. The only issue is that I really need a little more support in the lumbar region. Otherwise, this pillow is great.
customer_reviews.author: PolkaDot

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this pillow is so AMAZING. I have a client’s chair in my salon. I was noticing how uncomfortable my customers were in this chair without a proper back support. I did my search on Amazon for lumbar support and picked this product. OMG, it is such a great support. My customers are so comfortable now and even want fall asleep while getting services done. Pillow is soft and stays firm where you belted it. Please, make sure you are placing it not too low. Just try first its position on your back before fixing it by belts.
customer_reviews.author: Olga S

customer_reviews.title: Very back pain  relieving back support
customer_reviews.text: Despite what going on in the world at the present time this Lumbar support arrived relatively quickly thur Amazon Prime it was package well came with informational warranty and is a quite substantial memory foam product . Fits well with adjustable straps over a oversized office chair.
